events.message: Customer submitted a mortgage loan application for purchasing a new house, including all preliminary personal and financial details.
The application was categorised under mortgage loans as it pertains to financing a property purchase.
Assigned a loan officer specialized in home mortgages to manage the customerâ€™s case and guide them through the process.
Initial assessment of the mortgage application was conducted, verifying eligibility and completeness of submitted information.
Customer was asked to provide additional documents including property valuation report, employment proof, and bank statements.
Customer submitted all requested documents on time, including appraisal report and updated financial records.
Performed credit check on the applicant; credit history showed strong repayment patterns and no defaults.
Risk assessment determined the mortgage loan application as low risk due to stable income and strong credit score.
Mortgage loan offer was presented to the customer including loan amount, interest rate, and repayment schedule.
Customer provided feedback on the offer, requesting clarification on the early repayment terms and penalties.
Escalated the application to senior management to review customer's concerns regarding repayment flexibility.
The mortgage loan was approved with agreed terms after resolution of applicant's queries and internal review.
Funds for the approved mortgage loan were disbursed to the designated property seller as scheduled.
Followed up with customer post-funding to ensure satisfaction with loan service and provide support for next steps.
Loan application process successfully closed after completion of mortgage funding and customer satisfaction confirmed.
